AutoScalingGroupName.description: The name of the Auto Scaling group.

DesiredCapacity.description: The number of EC2 instances that should be running in the Auto Scaling group.

HonorCooldown.description: By default, SetDesiredCapacity overrides any cooldown period associated with the Auto Scaling group. Specify True to make Auto Scaling to wait for the cool-down period associated with the Auto Scaling group to complete before initiating a scaling activity to set your Auto Scaling group to its new capacity.
